info.description: This is the API documentation for Star Mall service.
info.title: Star Mall API

get.description: 通过用户ID获取用户购物车
get.summary: 通过用户ID获取用户购物车

get.description: 通过购物车ID获取用户购物车
get.summary: 通过购物车ID获取用户购物车

post.description: 根据搜索关键词推荐商品(sse 响应)
post.summary: 根据搜索关键词推荐商品

post.description: 根据用户标签推荐商品(sse协议)
post.summary: 根据用户标签推荐商品

get.description: 检查后端是否正常运行
根据商户 ID 获取商户信息, 返回商户信息
get.summary: 根据商户 ID 获取商户信息

get.description: 根据商家名称搜索商家, 返回匹配的商家列表
get.summary: 根据商家名称搜索商家

parameters.description: Merchant name to search for (minimum 2 characters)
parameters.name: name

200.description: List of merchants matching the search criteria

get.summary: GetProductByMerchant 通过商家获取商品

delete.description: 删除当前登录用户的账户

patch.description: 用户忘记密码, 重置密码接口

post.description: 用户通过 email 或 userID 登录

role.description: 规则ID, 用于分别用户类型

createPrice.description: @Description 商品加入购物车时价格

businessType.description:
BusinessType represents the categories of business the merchant operates in
Required: true
Example: [1, 3, 5]

email.description:
Email is the merchant's contact email address
Required: true
Example: merchant@example.com

name.description:
Name is the merchant's business name
Required: true
Min length: 2
Max length: 32

password.description:
Password for merchant account
Required: true
Min length: 8
Format: password

phone.description:
Phone is the merchant's contact phone number in E.164 format
Required: true
Example: +8613800138000

realID.description:
RealID is the ID card number of the merchant's representative
Required: true
Length: 18

realName.description:
RealName is the legal name of the merchant's representative
Required: true
Min length: 2
Max length: 32

verificationCode.description: 用户收到的邮箱验证码, 用于验证用户身份

uploadToken.description: UploadToken 后续传输图片所需的 临时用户凭证

name.description:
Name 商家店铺名称
Required: true
Min length: 2
Max length: 32

isChat.description: @Description 是否启用 r1 模型, true: 使用 v3 模型, false: 使用 r1 深度思考模型

msg.description: @Description 商品搜索关键词(用户登录请求ai接口忽略该参数)
